tweet_text:
@jainnimit Hi Namit! We understand your concern. Triggering the Stop Price and placing the Limit Order does not guarantee that your order will be fully filled or executed. Sometimes, the liquidity may be low at your Limit Price or the market may go through your limit price too fast. 
(1/2)
text_en: Hi Namit! We understand your concern. Triggering the Stop Price and placing the Limit Order does not guarantee that your order will be fully filled or executed. Sometimes, the liquidity may be low at your Limit Price or the market may go through your limit price too fast. (1/2)
